Class CommandCooldown

      Returns:

    • canIgnoreCooldown

      public boolean canIgnoreCooldown(org.bukkit.entity.Player player)
      Parameters:
      player - - Player to test permissions.
      Returns:
      - True if player has permission of ignoring cooldown. NOTE that if player is OP AND there is NO ignored permissions, it will return false!

    • hasCooldown

      public boolean hasCooldown(org.bukkit.entity.Player player)
      Returns true if player is currently on cooldown and stops the cooldown if it's over.
      Parameters:
      player - - Player to test.
      Returns:
      - True if player is on cooldown, false otherwise.
